text: 24.43: 1 Te 5.2 naŋga, 2 Pi 3.10 naŋga, Sk 3.3 naŋga, 16.1524.43-44: Lu 12.39-40Nɨmata vana nɨrɨm indarɨmitamara. Tavɨ nɨŋuva mɨŋga, kamata hɨrɨvɨyɨra kru kipa naŋga mɨŋga kɨvɨyɨ yandɨ tavɨ nɨñɨ kipa mɨŋɨrɨm payɨ vata nuŋandɨ tavɨ ha karatamahi. Kamati kipa naŋga hama nuŋandɨ tavɨ ha mɨŋavirɨhuta maŋindɨhuhi.
